name: Miconoide fluttuante di Hydro
desc:
Un organismo fatto di spore e dotato di una certa intelligenza. Possiede un'estrema capacità di adattamento.
Si dice che abbia un sapore terribile. Tuttavia, essendo molto umido all'interno, questo fungo può essere usato come fonte d'acqua in caso d'emergenza...

customize.text: Un mostro dall'intelligenza basilare evolutosi dalle spore. Quando colpito da <color=#ffe14b>attacchi di Electro o Pyro</color> , entrerà nello stato di Attivazione o Scottatura in base al tipo di attacco elementale usato. Sconfiggi questo fungaccio mutato per ottenere vari tipi di ricompense.

customize.name: Hydrofungo radicato
customize.desc:
A mimetic life form made out of spores that has extreme adaptability.

This creature may look like a bird, but it cannot fly. Due to the influence of Hydro energies, it is astoundingly agile compared to others of its kind. Some research has inferred that this creature is in fact an aggregation of countless tiny spores rather than a single entity.

This creature has a position of command amongst colonies of Fungi and exhibits heightened intelligence to match.

customize.name: Miconoide oblungo di Anemo
customize.desc:
A spore organism of some intelligence. It possesses extreme adaptability.

This mushroom quickly absorbs nutrients through its extended column, and its umbrella-shaped cap turns where the wind's flow carries it.

customize.name: Miconoide vorticoso di Electro
customize.desc:
A spore organism of some intelligence. It possesses extreme adaptability.

Research has shown that this sort of fungal beast's internal electric current will change periodically. If further developed, perhaps this study may give rise to a wide range of uses...

customize.name: Miconoide fluttuante di Anemo
customize.desc:
A spore organism of some intelligence. It possesses extreme adaptability.

This mushroom may have a sizable cap, but the umbrella-shaped structure is in fact hollow, and thus does not make for a particularly good meal.

customize.name: Miconoide vorticoso di Cryo
customize.desc:
A spore organism of some intelligence. It possesses extreme adaptability.

Putting Fungi on ice does not make them taste any better, but it does at least help with relieving the heat.

customize.name: Miconoide vorticoso di Pyro
customize.desc:
A spore organism of some intelligence. It possesses extreme adaptability.

Due to the abundant amount of Pyro these creatures contain, they have a tendency to cause forest fires during dry seasons, and thus are considered a dangerous invasive species to the forest.

customize.name: Miconoide oblungo di Pyro
customize.desc:
A spore organism of some intelligence. It possesses extreme adaptability.

This creature only looks explosive — it is, in fact, a most gentle soul, so long as you don't get too close...

customize.name: Miconoide fluttuante di Dendro
customize.desc:
A spore organism of some intelligence. It possesses extreme adaptability.

A researcher once said that these are some species of Dendro Specter. After this view was criticized, he changed his tack, claiming that this was just a literary turn of phrase.

customize.name: Miconoide oblungo di Geo
customize.desc:
A spore organism of some intelligence. It possesses extreme adaptability.

These shrooms' caps have hard outer layers derived from concretions of Geo energy. Its bodily structure is also quite likely to be denser than others of its kind.

customize.name: Miconoide retrattile di Electro
customize.desc:
A spore organism of some intelligence. It possesses extreme adaptability.

Unlike other Fungi, this creature possesses a cap with a luminous tendril sticking out of it. When in danger, it will release small electric orbs as a form of self-defense.

dropMaterial.name: Spore fungine
dropMaterial.desc: Una piccola quantità di spore brillanti lasciate dai Miconoidi fluttuanti. Pare che sia sufficiente uno starnuto per far sì che questa polvere svanisca senza lasciare traccia.

dropMaterial.name: Polline luminescente
dropMaterial.desc: Una piccola quantità di polvere luminescente di Spora di fungo, un comune ingrediente medicinale nella terra delle foreste pluviali. I mercanti lo vendono solitamente in pacchetti di carta.

dropMaterial.name: Polvere di ciste cristallina
dropMaterial.desc: Un grosso grumo di polvere di spore ottenuta da una ciste di spore strutturalmente completa. Inserita in un ambiente adatto, potrebbe colonizzare la zona di floride aggregazioni di Miconoidi fluttuanti...
